try {
    $result = $mediaConvertClient->createJob([
        "Role" => "IAM_ROLE_ARN",
        "Settings" => $jobSetting, //JobSettings structure
        "Queue" => "JOB_QUEUE_ARN",
        "UserMetadata" => [
            "Customer" => "Amazon"
        ],
    ]);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage();
    echo "\n";
}
